head: thunderstorm protection
subhead: Traditional lightning protection systems for buildings and systems based on new technologies (the use of active lightning rods)
pain: today, technologies based on the active reception of atmospheric electricity are increasingly being used
solutions: lightning protection systems for private housing in conjunction with other security systems
new: Today, technologies based on the active reception of atmospheric electricity are increasingly being used. Active lightning protection allows you to protect both the building and the surrounding area with one active lightning rod, thus providing greater coverage of the territory. At the same time, a minimum of funds is spent on the purchase of equipment and a minimum of time for its mounting
